GameConditionDef.label: bloodmoon
GameConditionDef.description: During the bloodmoon avatars of Hircine may appear around the map. Hunting these can grant your colonists permanent buffs. Beware though, as during a bloodmoon you will not always be the hunter.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: the blood moon will soon rise for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The hunt comes to an end.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The bloodmoon rises, the horn calls, howls can be heard in the distance. The hunt begins.
